display_information.name: Message Remover Bot
display_information.description: A powerful Slack bot that allows workspace administrators to silently delete any message from any user through a simple right-click action. Regular users can delete their own messages.
display_information.long_description: This bot provides message management capabilities for Slack workspaces. Administrators can delete messages from any user, while regular users can delete their own messages. The bot operates silently without confirmation messages and can remove both the selected message and all its replies.

shortcuts.name: Remove Message & Replies
shortcuts.description: Silently remove this message and all its replies
